dc:title: Spring Appeal - March 1961
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Asks readers to "forgive the seventy times seven times we go on asking." Recalls biblical stories where people are fed in seemingly hopeless situations.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 779 1961-03-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
